articles.title: YouTube Android App Gets 4K HDR Streaming Support - Gadgets 360
articles.description: YouTube on Android now has 4K HDR streaming support. To see if you’ve got 4K HDR streaming support on your Android phone, go to any YouTube video that has been uploaded in 4K and click on the three dots menu icon on the top right corner of the video box. Sele…
